mapper.update:
update customer_verified
customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
national_id = #{nationalId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
first_name = #{firstName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
last_name = #{lastName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
id_card_type = #{idCardType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
id_card_num = #{idCardNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
id_card_front_photo = #{idCardFrontPhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
id_card_back_photo = #{idCardBackPhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
id_card_real_photo = #{idCardRealPhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
reject_reason_code = #{rejectReasonCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reject_reason_msg = #{rejectReasonMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
review_time = #{reviewTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
jumio_remark = #{jumioRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
jumio_biz_id = #{jumioBizId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
jumio_submit_time = #{jumioSubmitTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
id_card_expire_time = #{idCardExpireTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
jumio_birthday = #{jumioBirthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
jumio_first_name = #{jumioFirstName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
jumio_last_name = #{jumioLastName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update customer_verified set customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, national_id = #{nationalId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, first_name = #{firstName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_name = #{lastName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, id_card_type = #{idCardType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, id_card_num = #{idCardNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, id_card_front_photo = #{idCardFrontPhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, id_card_back_photo = #{idCardBackPhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, id_card_real_photo = #{idCardRealPhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, reject_reason_code = #{rejectReasonCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reject_reason_msg = #{rejectReasonMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, review_time = #{reviewTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, jumio_remark = #{jumioRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jumio_biz_id = #{jumioBizId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jumio_submit_time = #{jumioSubmitTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, id_card_expire_time = #{idCardExpireTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jumio_birthday = #{jumioBirthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jumio_first_name = #{jumioFirstName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jumio_last_name = #{jumioLastName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from customer_verified where national_id = #{nationalId} and id_card_num = #{idCardNum} limit 1

select cv.* from customer_verified cv JOIN customer c ON (cv.customer_id = c.id)
ORDER by id desc limit #{from},#{limit}
select count(*) from customer_verified cv JOIN customer c ON (cv.customer_id = c.id)

select
from customer_verified where status = 2 and #{curTime} > id_card_expire_time limit 1
